properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA out 10 nm; Coastal waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR out 10 nm; Waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 3 at 2:19PM PST until January 6 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, south winds 25 to 35 kt with gusts
up to 45 kt and very steep wind driven seas 12 to 17 feet. For
the Small Craft Advisory, west to southwest winds 10 to 20 kt
with gusts up to 25 kt and seas 11 to 16 feet at 13 seconds
expected.

* WHERE...All areas.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, until midnight PST tonight. For
the Small Craft Advisory, from midnight tonight to 4 PM PST
Monday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds and very steep seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Low visibility conditions are expected.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid strong winds and very steep
seas. Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or
secure the vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 4 PM PST MONDAY
